test-case.name: targetSearchWithVariousFilterCombinationsAndOrderByDistributionSet
test-case.description: Tests the correct order of targets based on selected distribution set. The system expects to have an order based on installed, assigned DS.

test-case.name: targetSearchWithVariousFilterCombinations
test-case.description: Tests different parameter combinations for target search operations. That includes both the test itself, as a count operation with the same filters and query definitions by RSQL (named and un-named).

test-case.name: findTargetByAssignedDistributionSet
test-case.description: Verfies that targets with given assigned DS are returned from repository.

test-case.name: targetSearchWithOverdueFilterAndOrderByDistributionSet
test-case.description: Tests the correct order of targets with applied overdue filter based on selected distribution set. The system expects to have an order based on installed, assigned DS.

test-case.name: findTargetByInstalledDistributionSet
test-case.description: Verfies that targets with given installed DS are returned from repository.

test-case.name: findTargetWithoutAssignedDistributionSet
test-case.description: Verifies that targets without given assigned DS are returned from repository.
